ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ahh, after I posted this question, I saw the same information on the shaman list. Nice to see it confirmed.  Regen has to be cast while hymn isn t in
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Andy Simpson" <gohorns@...>
>
>
>>
>> On that same note, does Hymn stack with a shaman's
>> regeneration/chloroplast line?
>
>I played with a shaman in Guk a few nights ago. He had to get out of range
>of hymn or have me turn off hymn before he could use regen, but so long as
>regen was cast while he was not affected by my song, when he got into range
>he got his regen bonus and my mymn bonus.
>
>Anthem Dirgemaker
>26th level Bard of Qeynos
>Solusek Ro
>
>


Ahh, after I posted this question, I saw the same information on the shaman
list.
Nice to see it confirmed. Regen has to be cast while hymn isn't in effect.
It's
probably best to assume the same for quickness/alacrity with regards to
anthem
et. al.
